name: mermaid-live-mcp-server
description: A Model Context Protocol server for generating Mermaid diagrams using Mermaid Live and Mermaid Ink
long_description: This Model Context Protocol (MCP) server provides powerful diagram generation capabilities using Mermaid.js through Mermaid Live and Mermaid Ink APIs. Create flowcharts, sequence diagrams, class diagrams, state diagrams, and more.

mermaid_ink_base_url.title: Mermaid Ink Base URL
mermaid_ink_base_url.description: Mermaid Ink API base URL for image generation

default_output_dir.title: Default Output Directory
default_output_dir.description: Default directory for saving files (absolute path only, empty defaults to Desktop)

default_background_color.title: Default Background Color
default_background_color.description: Default background color for generated images

tools.name: create-mermaid-diagram
tools.description: Generate Mermaid diagrams in various formats (editor URL, view URL, image, SVG, PDF) - supports flowcharts, sequence diagrams, class diagrams, state diagrams, and more

tools.name: get-mermaid-editor-url
tools.description: Get Mermaid Live editor URL for interactive diagram editing

tools.name: get-mermaid-view-url
tools.description: Get Mermaid Live view URL for sharing diagram previews

tools.name: save-mermaid-image
tools.description: Save Mermaid diagram as image file (PNG, SVG, PDF) to local filesystem

tools.name: get-mermaid-help
tools.description: Get detailed usage information and examples for Mermaid diagram creation

prompts.name: create_flowchart_url
prompts.description: Create a flowchart and get editor URL
prompts.text: Create a flowchart showing our development process. Include decision points and clear flow directions. Generate an editor URL so I can modify it interactively.

prompts.name: create_flowchart_file
prompts.description: Create a flowchart and save to file
prompts.text: Create a flowchart showing our development process. Include decision points and clear flow directions. Save it as PNG file to my desktop for documentation.

prompts.name: create_sequence_diagram_url
prompts.description: Create a sequence diagram and get editor URL
prompts.text: Create a sequence diagram for our API authentication flow. Show all the interactions between client, server, and database. Generate an editor URL for team review.

prompts.name: create_sequence_diagram_file
prompts.description: Create a sequence diagram and save to file
prompts.text: Create a sequence diagram for our API authentication flow. Show all the interactions between client, server, and database. Save it as SVG file for our technical documentation.

prompts.name: create_class_diagram_url
prompts.description: Create a class diagram and get editor URL
prompts.text: Generate a class diagram for our user management system. Include relationships, methods, and properties. Provide an editor URL for collaborative editing.

prompts.name: create_class_diagram_file
prompts.description: Create a class diagram and save to file
prompts.text: Generate a class diagram for our user management system. Include relationships, methods, and properties. Save it as PDF file for architecture documentation.

prompts.name: create_state_diagram_url
prompts.description: Create a state diagram and get editor URL
prompts.text: Create a state diagram for our order processing workflow. Show all states and transitions clearly. Generate an editor URL for stakeholder review.

prompts.name: create_state_diagram_file
prompts.description: Create a state diagram and save to file
prompts.text: Create a state diagram for our order processing workflow. Show all states and transitions clearly. Save it as PNG file for process documentation.

prompts.name: create_gantt_chart_url
prompts.description: Create a Gantt chart and get editor URL
prompts.text: Create a Gantt chart for our project timeline. Include milestones and task dependencies. Generate an editor URL for project planning collaboration.

prompts.name: create_gantt_chart_file
prompts.description: Create a Gantt chart and save to file
prompts.text: Create a Gantt chart for our project timeline. Include milestones and task dependencies. Save it as PDF file for project management.
